About.Intro: I'm an aspiring Web Developer and I'm on my journey to become a full fledged Web Dev that's a Fullstack developer that excels in both Back-end and Front-end development.

About.Interest&passion: I've been greatly interested in Science and Tech for as long as I can remember. I am very passionate in learning new things and debating in topics that I consider to be interesting. I always try my best to always deliver what is expected of me. My wish is to be part of a company that will allow me grow further as a Dev

testimonials.name: Simanye Somdaka
testimonials.Comment: Working with Khanya has been a game-changer for me. His dedication to clean, efficient code has significantly improved our project performance and scalability. He's a valuable asset to any development team.

testimonials.name: Yakupha Ntontshini
testimonials.Comment: Khanya Pupuma is an exceptional developerwith a keen eye for detail. His ability to tackle complex problems and deliver high-quality solutions is truly impressive.It's always a pleasure to work alongside him.

testimonials.name: Daniel Umetor
testimonials.Comment: Khanya's contributions in my team have been invaluable.His depth in knowlegde in software development coupled with his collaborative spirit has greatly contributed to his projects. I would highly recommend him to anyone seeking a talented and reliable developer.

testimonials.name: Keira Kistensamy
testimonials.Comment: I've had the pleasure of working with Pupuma on several projects, and each timehe has exceeded expectations. His professionalism, technical expertise, and ability t communicate effectively make him an invaluable teammate. I look forward to working with him again in the future.

testimonials.name: Erin Williams
testimonials.Comment: Khanya is very reliable and skilled developer who consistently makes results. His strong problem-solving skills and proactive approach make him a standout member on teams.   I highly recommend him for any development project.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: A calculator designed to replicate a cell phone calculator, it easily allows for small and handful calculations.

projects.name: To-do list
projects.description: A web application that allows users to write and create a short list of things too do for the sake of memory assistance.

projects.name: E-Commerce
projects.description: A multi-paged Anime based e-commerce website that allows for the purchasing of mangas.

projects.name: Temparature Converter
projects.description: A webpage containing a calculator that assists for the user to convert Celsius-to-Fahrenheit and also Fahrenheit-to-Celsius
